shorty noun [C]
(ATTRACTIVE WOMAN)
US slang (also shawty) an attractive young woman: Hey shorty, what's up? Take U To Da Movies is about taking a shawty to see a movie.
shorty noun [C]
(SHORT CLOTHING)
an item of clothing that is shorter than the usual kind: Personally, I only ever wear a shorty - no full wetsuits for me. You love the cutesy comfort of your shorty.
